name: Defense Force (PAPERMOON_SO)
description:
Defend the base from the enemy, and manage your ammo carefully. More detailed descriptions of game mechanics can be found in the INFO menu.

Controls (assuming keyboard or Xbox controller):

Keyboard
Xbox
Action (game)
Action (menu)
Arrow keys
D-pad/Left analog stick
MoveMoveZ key
A button
ShootAcceptX key
B button
Reload
BackA key
X button
PauseNone

These controls can be reconfigured by pressing the escape key, then navigating to "options", then "setup gamepad".
